attributes.additional_details:
Borris is a national icon, he got the UK through Brexit and got the job done.
He got the UK through a pandemic that none of us have ever experienced.
He’s likeable and down to earth, relatable to everyone and we need him back to bring unity to the country and restore faith in the Conservative Party.
attributes.background: Bring back Borris Johnson as Prime Minister to run the country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or replaced.

In any case, decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
